section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Land trust" means a qualified conservation organization as defined in § 3-2A-01 of the Natural Resources Article.

text.section:
The Mayor and City Council of Baltimore City or the governing body of a county or municipal corporation may provide, by law, for:
the amount and duration of the property tax credit under this section; and
any other provision necessary to carry out the property tax credit under this section.

To qualify for a property tax credit under this section, a land trust shall:
be certified by the Maryland Environmental Trust to be a land trust in good standing and to have a cooperative agreement in effect; and
obtain a written certification every 5 years beginning July 1, 1998, or as scheduled by the Maryland Environmental Trust.
